description: This quick and easy glaze is the perfect Christmas ham glaze recipe. Using only 4 ingredients, it will be ready in no time.
keywords: Glaze,Pescatarian,Seafood free,Gluten free,Tree nut free,Egg free,Sesame free,Ham,Halal,Christmas,Soy free,Wheat free,Vegetarian,Vegan,Dairy free,Peanut free
name: Classic Brown Sugar & Mustard Glaze Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Place sugar, syrup, mustard, thyme and 1/4 cup water in a small saucepan over low heat. Cook, stirring, for 5 minutes or until sugar has dissolved.
Increase heat to medium and bring mixture to a simmer. Simmer for 5 minutes or until slightly thickened. Stand for 15 minutes to cool. Discard thyme sprigs.
